import React from "react"; /** * HomePage - Prototype home dashboard for Educative AI Game * This page is intentionally self-contained with inline styles * so you can drop it into a Create React App project without extra deps. */ export default function HomePage({ user, onStartGame, onLogout }) { const displayName = user?.email?.split("@")[0] ?? "Educator"; return (
üß†
Educative AI
Generative Quiz & Classroom Play
Hi, {displayName}

Turn any topic into a playable quiz in seconds

Paste notes, upload a PDF, or pick a subject. Our AI generates multi‚Äëdifficulty questions, auto‚Äëgrades answers, and tracks class progress.

MCQ ‚Ä¢ Short Answer ‚Ä¢ Buzzer Adaptive difficulty Export to CSV
Quick start
{quickItems.map((q) => ( ))}

Recent activity

    {recentActivity.map((a) => (
  • {a.title}
    {a.meta}
    {a.right}
    • ))}

Assigned quizzes

    {assigned.map((q) => (
  • {q.title}
    {q.meta}
    {q.mode} {q.count} Qs
    • ))}

How it works

  1. Input. Paste notes, upload PDF, or give a topic.
  2. Generate. AI creates questions across Easy / Medium / Hard.
  3. Host or assign. Live play with buzzers or async homework.
  4. Track. See attempts, accuracy, and mastery by concept.
Prototype: UI only, swap hooks to your real API later.
¬© {new Date().getFullYear()} Educative AI
Prototype build ‚Ä¢ v0.1
); } const quickItems = [ { icon: "üìù", title: "Blank quiz", desc: "Start from scratch" }, { icon: "üìé", title: "From document", desc: "Upload PDF / DOCX" }, { icon: "üîç", title: "From topic", desc: "Type a subject" }, { icon: "üèÜ", title: "Host game", desc: "Live, with buzzers" }, ]; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, color: "#22c55e", title: "‚ÄúIntro to Cells‚Äù hosted", meta: "24 players ‚Ä¢ Avg 78%", right: "2h ago" }, { id: 2, color: "#eab308", title: "New quiz generated", meta: "Kinematics ‚Ä¢ 15 questions", right: "Yesterday" }, { id: 3, color: "#38bdf8", title: "Classroom ‚ÄúCPS101 A1‚Äù created", meta: "32 students enrolled", right: "Mon" }, ]; const assigned = [ { id: "a1", title: "Stoichiometry Practice Set", meta: "Due Fri ‚Ä¢ 11:59pm", mode: "Homework", count: 20 }, { id: "a2", title: "World War I Review", meta: "Due Sun ‚Ä¢ 5:00pm", mode: "Homework", count: 12 }, ]; const styles = { page: { minHeight: "100vh", background: "#0b1220", color: "#e5e7eb", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column" }, header: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", padding: "14px 20px", borderBottom: "1px solid #1f2937", position: "sticky", top: 0, background: "rgba(11,18,32,0.9)", backdropFilter: "blur(6px)", zIndex: 10 }, brand: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: 12 }, logo: { fontSize: 28 }, title: { fontWeight: 700, letterSpacing: 0.3 }, subtitle: { fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.7 }, nav: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: 8 }, navBtn: { background: "transparent", border: "1px solid transparent", color: "#cbd5e1", padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer" }, userChip: { background: "#111827", border: "1px solid #334155", padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 999 }, logoutBtn: { background: "#111827", border: "1px solid #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer" }, main: { width: "min(1100px, 92%)", margin: "20px auto", flex: 1, display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: 20 }, hero: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1.5fr 1fr", gap: 20, alignItems: "stretch" }, h1: { margin: 0, fontSize: "2rem", lineHeight: 1.2 }, lead: { marginTop: 8, opacity: 0.85 }, ctaRow: { display: "flex", gap: 10, marginTop: 16, flexWrap: "wrap" }, primary: { background: "#2563eb", border: "1px solid #1d4ed8", color: "white", padding: "10px 14px", borderRadius: 10, fontWeight: 600, cursor: "pointer" }, secondary: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "10px 14px", borderRadius: 10, cursor: "pointer" }, tertiary: { background: "transparent", border: "1px dashed #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "10px 14px", borderRadius: 10, cursor: "pointer" }, badges: { display: "flex", gap: 8, marginTop: 12, flexWrap: "wrap" }, badge: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", padding: "6px 10px", borderRadius: 999, fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.9 }, heroCard: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", borderRadius: 14, padding: 16, display:"flex", flexDirection:"column", gap: 12 }, heroCardHeader: { fontWeight: 600, borderBottom: "1px solid #1f2937", paddingBottom: 8 }, quickGrid: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1fr 1fr", gap: 8 }, quickItem: { background: "#0b1220", border: "1px solid #1f2937", borderRadius: 12, padding: 12, textAlign: "left", cursor: "pointer" }, quickIcon: { fontSize: 20 }, quickTitle: { fontWeight: 600, marginTop: 6, color: "#ffffff" }, quickDesc: { color: "#ffffff", fontSize: 12 }, grid: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1fr 1fr 1fr", gap: 20 }, card: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", borderRadius: 14, padding: 16, display:"flex", flexDirection:"column", gap: 12 }, cardHeader: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center" }, h2: { margin: 0, fontSize: "1rem" }, linkBtn: { background: "transparent", border: "1px solid transparent", color: "#93c5fd", cursor: "pointer" }, list: { listStyle: "none", padding: 0, margin: 0, display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: 8 }, listItem: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "space-between", border: "1px solid #1f2937", borderRadius: 12, padding: 12, background: "#0b1220" }, dot: (color) => ({ width: 10, height: 10, borderRadius: 999, background: color, marginTop: 4 }), itemTitle: { fontWeight: 600 }, itemMeta: { fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.7, marginTop: 2 }, itemRight: { fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.7 }, tagRow: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: 8 }, tag: { background: "#0b1220", border: "1px solid #1f2937", padding: "4px 8px", borderRadius: 999, fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.9 }, smallBtn: { background: "#1f2937", border: "1px solid #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "6px 10px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer", fontSize: 12 }, steps: { margin: 0, paddingLeft: 18, lineHeight: 1.7, opacity: 0.9 }, note: { marginTop: 8, fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.7 }, footer: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", gap: 12, padding: "18px 20px", borderTop: "1px solid #1f2937", marginTop: 30 } };
